Snippet.Title: CRM Plug-in NUnit Integration Test
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM plug-in NUnit integration test.

Snippet.Title: CRM Plug-in NUnit Test
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM plug-in NUnit test.

Snippet.Title: CRM Plug-in Integration Test
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM plug-in integration test.

Snippet.Title: CRM Workflow NUnit Integration Test
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM workflow NUnit integration test.

Snippet.Title: CRM Workflow Unit Test
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM workflow unit test.

Snippet.Title: CRM Workflow Integration Test
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM workflow integration test.

Snippet.Title: CRM Workflow Unit Test With Mock
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM workflow unit test with CRM Organization Service mock.

Snippet.Title: CRM Workflow NUnit Test
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM workflow NUnit test.

Snippet.Title: CRM Plug-in Unit Test With Mock
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM plug-in unit test with CRM Organization Service mock.

Snippet.Title: CRM Plug-in Unit Test
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM plug-in unit test.

Snippet.Title: CRM Workflow Output Parameter
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM custom workflow output parameter.

Snippet.Title: CRM Workflow Input Parameter
Snippet.Description: Creates a Dynamics CRM custom workflow input parameter.

Snippet.Title: Fire OnChange (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Causes the OnChange event to occur on the attribute so that any script associated to that event can execute.

Snippet.Title: Get IsPartyList (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the lookup represents a partylist lookup. Partylist lookups allow for multiple records to be set, such as the To: field for an email entity record.

Snippet.Title: Get Submit Mode (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string indicating when data from the attribute will be submitted when the record is saved.

Snippet.Title: Get Selected Option (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the option object that is selected in an optionset attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Required Level (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string value indicating whether a value for the attribute is required or recommended.

Snippet.Title: Get Precision (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the number of digits allowed to the right of the decimal point.

Snippet.Title: Parent (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the Xrm.Page.data.entity object that is the parent to all attributes.

Snippet.Title: Get Options (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns an array of option objects representing the valid options for an optionset attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Option (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns an option object with the value matching the argument passed to the method.

Snippet.Title: Get Attribute Name (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string representing the logical name of the attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Min (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a number indicating the minimum allowed value for an attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Max Length (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a number indicating the maximum length of a string or memo attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Max (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a number indicating the maximum allowed value for an attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get User Privilege (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns an object with three Boolean properties corresponding to privileges indicating if the user can create, read or update data values for an attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Text (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string value of the text for the currently selected option for an optionset attribute.

Snippet.Title: Set Submit Mode (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets whether data from the attribute will be submitted when the record is saved.

Snippet.Title: Set Required Level (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets whether data is required or recommended for the attribute before the record can be saved.

Snippet.Title: Remove OnChange (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Removes a function from the OnChange event hander for an attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Attribute Value (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Retrieves the data value for an attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Initial Value (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value that represents the value set for an OptionSet or Boolean attribute when the form opened.

Snippet.Title: Get Format (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string value that represents formatting options for the attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get Attribute Type (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string value that represents the type of attribute.

Snippet.Title: Get IsDirty (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a Boolean value indicating if there are unsaved changes to the attribute value.

Snippet.Title: ForEach Sections (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Apply an action in a delegate function to each object in the collection of sections.

Snippet.Title: ForEach Tabs (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Apply an action in a delegate function to each object in the collection of tabs.

Snippet.Title: ForEach Form Selector (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Apply an action in a delegate function to each object in the collection of forms.

Snippet.Title: ForEach Navigation Item (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Apply an action in a delegate function to each object in the collection of navigation items.

Snippet.Title: ForEach Attributes (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Apply an action in a delegate function to each object in the collection of attributes.

Snippet.Title: ForEach Controls (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Apply an action in a delegate function to each object in the collection of controls.

Snippet.Title: Get Sections (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: A collection of all the sections in a tab.

Snippet.Title: Get Sections Count (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Get the number of items in the collection of sections.

Snippet.Title: Get Tabs Count (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Get the number of items in the collection of tabs.

Snippet.Title: Get Tabs (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: A collection of all the tabs on the page.

Snippet.Title: Get Form Selectors (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: A collection of all the forms on the page.

Snippet.Title: Get Form Selectors Count (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Get the number of items in the collection of forms.

Snippet.Title: Get Navigation Items Count (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Get the number of items in the collection of navigation items.

Snippet.Title: Get Navigation Items. (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: A collection of all the navigation items on the page.

Snippet.Title: Get Attributes (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: A collection of all the attributes on the page.

Snippet.Title: Get Attributes Count (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Get the number of items in the collection of attributes.

Snippet.Title: Get Controls Count (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Get the number of items in the collection of controls.

Snippet.Title: Get Controls (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: A collection of all the controls on the page.

Snippet.Title: Get Is Auto Save Enabled (7.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns whether Autosave is enabled for the organization.

Snippet.Title: Get FormFactor (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to get information about the kind of device the user is using.

Snippet.Title: Get Client State (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value to indicate the state of the client.

Snippet.Title: Get Client (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value to indicate which client the script is executing in.

Snippet.Title: Get Time Zone Offset Minutes (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the difference between the local time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

Snippet.Title: Get User Name (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the name of the current user.

Snippet.Title: Prepend OrgName (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Prepends the organization name to the specified path.

Snippet.Title: Is Outlook Online (5.0-6.1)
Snippet.Description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the user is connected to the Microsoft Dynamics CRM server while using Microsoft Dynamics CRM for Microsoft Office Outlook with Offline Access. When this function returns false, the user is working offline without a connection to the server.

Snippet.Title: Is Outlook Client (5.0-6.1)
Snippet.Description: Returns a Boolean value indicating if the user is using Microsoft Dynamics CRM for Microsoft Office Outlook.

Snippet.Title: Get User Roles (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns an array of strings that represent the GUID values of each of the security roles that the user is associated with and any teams that the user is associated with.

Snippet.Title: Get User Lcid (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the LCID value that represents the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Language Pack that is the user selected as their preferred language.

Snippet.Title: Get User Id (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the GUID of the SystemUser.Id value for the current user.

Snippet.Title: Get Query String Parameters (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a dictionary object of key value pairs that represent the query string arguments that were passed to the page.

Snippet.Title: Get Org Unique Name (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the unique text value of the organization’s name.

Snippet.Title: Get LCID (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the LCID value that represents the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Language Pack that is the base language for the organization.

Snippet.Title: Get Current Theme (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string representing the current Microsoft Office Outlook theme chosen by the user.

Snippet.Title: Get Client Url (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the base URL that was used to access the application.

Snippet.Title: Add Custom Filter (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Use to add filters to the results displayed in the lookup. Each filter will be combined with any previously added filters as an “AND” condition.

Snippet.Title: Add Custom View (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Adds a new view for the lookup dialog box.

Snippet.Title: Remove PreSearch (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to remove event handler functions that have previously been set for the PreSearch event.

Snippet.Title: Add PreSearch (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to apply changes to lookups based on values current just as the user is about to view results for the lookup.

Snippet.Title: Clear Notification (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Remove a message already displayed for a control.

Snippet.Title: Set Notification (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Display a message near the control to indicate that data isn’t valid.

Snippet.Title: Get Show Time (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Get whether a date control shows the time portion of the date.

Snippet.Title: Set Show Time (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Specify whether a date control should show the time portion of the date.

Snippet.Title: Set Visible (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets a value that indicates whether the control is visible.

Snippet.Title: Set Src (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the URL to be displayed in an IFRAME or web resource.

Snippet.Title: Set Label (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the label for the control.

Snippet.Title: Set Focus (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the focus on the control.

Snippet.Title: Set Disabled (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets whether the control is disabled.

Snippet.Title: Set Default View (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the default view for the lookup control dialog.

Snippet.Title: Get Initial Url (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the default URL that an IFRAME control is configured to display. This method is not available for web resources.

Snippet.Title: Get Object (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the object in the form that represents an I-frame or web resource.

Snippet.Title: Set Data (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the value of the data query string parameter passed to a Silverlight web resource.

Snippet.Title: Remove Option (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Removes an option from an option set control.

Snippet.Title: Add OnSelection (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to add an event handler to the OnSelection event.

Snippet.Title: Set Search Query (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to set the text used as the search criteria for the knowledge base management control.

Snippet.Title: Get Selected Result (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to get the currently selected result of the search control. The currently selected result also represents the result that is currently open.

Snippet.Title: Get Search Query (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to get the text used as the search criteria for the knowledge base management control.

Snippet.Title: Remove OnSelection (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to remove an event handler from the OnSelection event.

Snippet.Title: Remove OnResultOpened (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to remove an event handler from the OnResultOpened event.

Snippet.Title: Add OnResultOpened (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to add an event handler to the OnResultOpened event.

Snippet.Title: Get Parature Control (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a reference to the knowledge base search control.

Snippet.Title: Prevent Default (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Cancels the save operation, but all remaining handlers for the event will still be executed.

Snippet.Title: Is Default Prevented (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value indicating whether the save event has been canceled because the preventDefault method was used in this event hander or a previous event handler.

Snippet.Title: Get Save Mode (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value indicating how the save event was initiated by the user.

Snippet.Title: Get Grid Control (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the grid control.

Snippet.Title: Set Grid Current View (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to set the current view.

Snippet.Title: Get Row Entity Primary Attribute Value (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the primary attribute value for the record in the row.

Snippet.Title: Get Row Entity Id (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the id for the record in the row.

Snippet.Title: Get Row Entity Reference (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the entity reference for the record in the row.

Snippet.Title: Get Row Entity Name (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the logical name for the record in the row.

Snippet.Title: Get Row Entity (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the GridEntity for the GridRowData.

Snippet.Title: Get Row Data (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the GridRowData for the GridRow.

Snippet.Title: Get Total Record Count (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the total number of records that match the filter criteria of the view, not limited by the number visible in a single page.

Snippet.Title: Get Selected Rows (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a collection of every selected GridRow in the Grid.

Snippet.Title: Get Rows (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a collection of every GridRow in the Grid.

Snippet.Title: Get Grid Current View (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to get a reference to the current view.

Snippet.Title: Is View Selector Visible (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to determine whether the view selector is visible.

Snippet.Title: Remove Grid OnLoad (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to remove event handlers from the GridControlOnLoad event.

Snippet.Title: Get View Selector (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to get access to the ViewSelector available for the GridControl.

Snippet.Title: Get Grid (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to get access to the Grid available in the GridControl.

Snippet.Title: Get Grid Entity Name (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to get the logical name of the entity data displayed in the grid.

Snippet.Title: Add Grid OnLoad (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to add event handlers to the GridControlOnLoad event.

Snippet.Title: Refresh (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Refreshes the data displayed in a subgrid.

Snippet.Title: Get Visible (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value that indicates whether the control is currently visible.

Snippet.Title: Get Src (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the current URL being displayed in an IFRAME or web resource.

Snippet.Title: Get Parent (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a reference to the section object that contains the control.

Snippet.Title: Get Name (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the name assigned to the control.

Snippet.Title: Get Label (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the label for the control.

Snippet.Title: Get Disabled (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns whether the control is disabled.

Snippet.Title: Get Default View (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the Id value of the default lookup dialog view.

Snippet.Title: Get Data (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the value of the data query string parameter passed to a Silverlight web resource.

Snippet.Title: Control Type (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value that categorizes controls.

Snippet.Title: Get Attribute (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the attribute that the control is bound to.

Snippet.Title: Clear Options (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Clears all options from an option set control.

Snippet.Title: Add Option (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Adds an option to an option set control.

Snippet.Title: Get Primary Attribute Value (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Gets a string for the value of the primary attribute of the entity.

Snippet.Title: Save (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Saves the record synchronously with the options to close the form or open a new form after the save is completed.

Snippet.Title: Remove OnSave (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Removes a function to be called when the record is saved.

Snippet.Title: Get IsDirty (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if any fields in the form have been modified.

Snippet.Title: Get Id (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string representing the GUID id value for the record.

Snippet.Title: Get Entity Name (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string representing the logical name of the entity for the record.

Snippet.Title: Get Data Xml (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a string representing the XML that will be sent to the server when the record is saved. Only data in fields that have changed are set to the server.

Snippet.Title: Add OnSave (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets a function to be called when the record is saved.

Snippet.Title: Set Attribute Value (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the data value for an attribute.

Snippet.Title: Add OnChange (5.0+)
Navigate (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Opens the specified form.

Snippet.Title: Get Form Label (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the label of the form.

Snippet.Title: Get Form Id (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the GUID ID of the form.

Snippet.Title: Set Tab Visible (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets a value that indicates whether the control is visible.

Snippet.Title: Get Tab Visible (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value that indicates whether the tab is visible.

Snippet.Title: Set Tab Focus (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the focus on the tab.

Snippet.Title: Set Tab Label (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the label for the tab.

Snippet.Title: Get Tab Label (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the tab label.

Snippet.Title: Get Tab Parent (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the Xrm.Page.ui (client-side reference) object.

Snippet.Title: Get Tab Name (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns the name of the tab.

Snippet.Title: Set Tab Display State (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Sets the tab to be collapsed or expanded.

Snippet.Title: Get Display State (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Returns a value that indicates whether the tab is collapsed or expanded.

Snippet.Title: Clear Form Notification (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to remove form level notifications.

Snippet.Title: Set Form Notification (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Use this method to display form level notifications.

Snippet.Title: Refresh Ribbon (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Method to cause the ribbon to re-evaluate data that controls what is displayed in it.

Snippet.Title: Get ViewPort Height (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Method to get the height of the viewport in pixels.

Snippet.Title: Get ViewPort Width(5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Method to get the width of the viewport in pixels.

Snippet.Title: Get Form Type (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Method to get the form context for the record.

Snippet.Title: Close (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Method to close the form.

Snippet.Title: Get Current Control (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Method to get the control object that currently has focus on the form. Web Resource and IFRAME controls are not returned by this method.

Snippet.Title: Is Activity Type (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Determine if an entity is an activity entity.

Snippet.Title: Confirm Dialog (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Displays a confirmation dialog box that contains an optional message as well as OK and Cancel buttons.

Snippet.Title: Alert Dialog (6.0+)
Snippet.Description: Displays a dialog box containing an application-defined message.

Snippet.Title: Open Quick Create (7.1+)
Snippet.Description: Opens a new quick create form.

Snippet.Title: Open Web Resource (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Opens an HTML web resource.

Snippet.Title: Open Entity Form (5.0+)
Snippet.Description: Opens an entity form.
